issue.title: [C++] Some global APIs of IPC module should be visible to the outside
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-244](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-244). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some global APIs such as MemoryMappedSource::Open() or WriteRowBatch() are not visible to the outside even though they are mandatory for users.
